meanings.definition: Mentioned or listed one by one
meanings.sent1: The teacher provided an enumerated list of the classroom rules.
meanings.sent2: The enumerated names of the students were written on the board.
meanings.sent3: The party invitation had an enumerated list of things to bring.
meanings.sent4: Her face lit up as she read the enumerated compliments in the letter.
meanings.sent5: The detailed map had an enumerated key for easy reference.

meanings.sent1: The enumerated coins in the jar added up to a dollar.
meanings.sent2: The total amount was determined by the enumerated bills in the wallet.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claimed to have an enumerated number of cookies in his stomach.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seemed like an enumerated collection on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The enumerated steps in the recipe ensured a perfect dish every time.

meanings.sent1: The enumerated instructions made assembling the furniture easy.
meanings.sent2: The contract included an enumerated breakdown of the costs.
meanings.sent3: She wore an enumerated outfit with matching accessories.
meanings.sent4: The garden was an enumerated display of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The artist's palette had an enumerated range of vibrant colors.
